subSections.title: Definitions
subSections.text:
{{zh-hanzi}}

# to [[hold]] something level with hand
# [[end]]; [[tip]]
# [[beginning]]; [[start]]
# [[upright]]; [[erect]]
# to [[wipe out]]; to [[destroy]] altogether
#* {{zh-x|警方 端 掉 販毒 窩點。|The police '''destroyed''' the lair of drug lords.}}
# {{lb|zh|figurative|colloquial|pejorative|usually followed by {{zh-l|*著/着}}}} to [[put on airs]]; to [[act]] [[pretentiously]]
# {{zh-div|母}} {{lb|zh|phonology}} a [[Middle Chinese]] [[initial]] and the [['Phags-pa]] script letter [[ꡊ]] (d-)
